programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Violet is upset to hear the baby might be in danger. Rose is anxious to find out how Adam feels about her. Alex doesn't approve of a relationship between Aravind and Sarah.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) In the second of our 2-part expose on Singapore's recycling efforts, host Munah Bagharib zooms in on plastics to uncover why our attempts at recycling plastics may be futile.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S5
programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. The series also shows how for on-air meteorologists, being on the front lines of Mother Nature is never easy and sometimes the reporter covering the story becomes the story.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S2
programme.desc: Imagination, design and creativity come to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and an unlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two compete against each other in brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40

programme.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey S2
programme.desc: Freshly Picked returns for a second season, and on the menu today is a quick and tasty weeknight pumpkin curry, and an epic lunchtime rice cake with a crispy finish. Plus, Jerry Mai is in the kitchen serving up the flavours of the Vietnamese countryside, and Simon gets on the tools at Grzaeland in Melbourne for fast food with a twist.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Street Food Asia
programme.desc: Luke continues his food journey in multicultural Kuala Lumpur. He meets his friend Tana in Brickfields, an area filled with a variety of Indian dishes. Tana escorts Luke to his favourite street food stalls where Luke tastes sweet and savoury treats, including the curry puffs said to provide the consumer with prosperity and happiness. Luke then meets the famous Mr Hung, who has a reputation for flying instant noodles nearly two stories high and then goes on a satay adventure at Ramal Food Junctio.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: In preparation for their upcoming match, Valt and Ken practice together just like old times and discover a new power awakening in Valtryek. The Beigoma Bey Club fears that this new knowledge will give the Beasts the upper hand. With the stakes mounting, Valt and Ken's friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S2
programme.desc: Titipo, Genie, and Diesel decide to take on Setter's work while Setter is under maintenance. Setter's work which seemed easy enough doesn't seem to have an end. The little trains regret their inconsiderate behavior towards Setter....

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The squares are thrilled when they think they have super powers, just like their hero, Amazing Man. They go around Ollipolis 'saving' their friends and making a mess! But when the Imp appears and puts their powers to the test, will they learn what it really means to be a hero? Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy are looking forward to Ollipolis' annual boating day, only to find the lake all dried up.

programme.desc: (重) 替代线性经济的是循环经济。概念就是，所生产的东西都会回归系统里，没有浪费，就算是废物，也可以重新想象成资源。每项资源都获得重生，甚至是多次重生的机会。循环经济就是以大自然为榜样，在自然界中，组装过程采用材料的方式非常有效，因为几何图形本来就存在。我们需要对我们和大自然，以及生态系统的关系更有意识，同时认真看待，并学会一种和谐的共存方式。.
